document_data.name: ''Everburn Blade''
document_data.mainbody: An '''''everburn blade''''' was a variety  of [[item enchantment|enchanted]] [[flaming]] [[greatsword]].
document_data.Description: When the ''everburn blade'' was drawn from its scabbard, flames erupted down the length of its blade.
document_data.Powers: The wielder of an ''everburn blade'' inflicted flaming damage whenever they struck a foe.
document_data.Notable Owners: * Commander [[Zhalk]], a [[cambion]] office in service of Archduchess [[Zariel]].
